text:
tylko - http://tylko.com - Poland (Warsaw). tylko is a start-up company on a mission to redefine the furniture industry. We are a team of designers, developers and managers that combine our knowledge of design and technology to bring customized furniture effortlessly to everyone.

We are looking for frontend developers with good html5, css, js (vanilla + threejs). Experience in webgl would be helpful. details: http://tylko.com/uploaded/jobs_pdfs/job_offer_FRONTEND.pdf Contact: slawek@tylko.com or jobs@tylko.com
